professionalSummary: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer with over seven years of development experience and proven leadership capabilities. Proficient in modern web technologies including C#, TypeScript, React, and Angular. Successfully transitioned from entrepreneurship (built and sold $600K+ business) to senior engineering roles. Demonstrated ability to lead teams, mentor developers, and drive technical initiatives from concept to deployment.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Develop robust back-end applications across multiple projects
Create responsive front-end interfaces with TypeScript, React, and Angular, enhancing user experience and engagement metrics
Lead full-stack integration initiatives, ensuring seamless data flow between client and server systems while improving overall system performance
Contribute to complete software development lifecycle from concept to deployment in collaborative team environment

experience.title: Full Stack Developer (Technical Lead)
responsibilities: Led front-end development team initiatives, implementing agile practices that improved team efficiency
Established test-driven development standards, significantly increasing code quality and reducing production bugs by getting test coverage to nearly 70% on our flagship product
Developed and maintained backend services, integrating multiple APIs to support frontend functionality
Collaborated with product managers to refine feature requirements and ensure alignment with user needs

experience.title: Front End Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained comprehensive design system for retail POS division, ensuring UI consistency across 15+ development teams
Created reusable JavaFX components and rapid prototyped features, improving development velocity across multiple teams
Collaborated with business analysts to align prototypes with design standards and document technical requirements

experience.title: Front End Developer & Scrum Master
responsibilities: Served dual role as technical developer and Scrum Master, facilitating agile ceremonies and removing team blockers
Mentored junior developers on front-end best practices and modern JavaScript frameworks
Implemented responsive web solutions using modern CSS frameworks and JavaScript libraries

experience.title: Software Engineer Senior Analyst
responsibilities: Designed interactive wireframes and mockups for legacy software redesign projects and developed single-page applications using Angular and React for Fortune 500 clients
Co-facilitated design thinking workshops, driving innovative solutions for client challenges
Contributed to team culture and collaboration initiatives in fast-paced consulting environment

experience.title: Founder & Technical Lead
responsibilities: Built and successfully sold cooking education business generating $600K+ annual revenue
Led technical initiatives including full-stack web development, e-commerce integration, and SEO optimization
Integrated Authorize.net APIs for PCI-compliant payment processing
Implemented responsive web design and performance optimizations, reducing page load times and improving checkout conversions
Coordinated culinary instruction for groups of 40+ participants, managing timing and logistics for multi-course meal preparation
